mapper.select: select b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @birthday)/365.2422) AS b.age from azb_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 1id,a.grtj as 1grtj,a.sfwf as 1sfwf,a.wffzqk as 1wffzqk,a.ajlb as 1ajlb,a.gzlx as 1gzlx,a.bfqk as 1bfqk, a.bfrdh as 1bfrdh,a.bfrxm as 1bfrxm,a.szqk as 1szqk,a.szjgmc as 1szjgmc, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from azb_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 2id,a.poxm as 2poxm,a.poxb as 2poxb,a.xgzdw as 2xgzdw,a.djjhny as 2djjhny,a.hkxz as 2hkxz,a.hyzk as 2hyzk, a.jysssj as 2jysssj,a.sslx as 2sslx,a.ssyy as 2ssyy,a.ccyy as 2ccyy, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from bear_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 4id,a.wwx as 4wwx,a.wwm as 4wwm,a.zwm as 4zwm,a.gj as 4gj, a.zjxy as 4zjxy,a.zjdm as 4zjdm,a.zjhm as 4zjhm,a.zjyxq as 4zjyxq,a.lhmd as 4lhmd, a.ddrq as 4ddrq,a.yjlkrq as 4yjlkrq,a.sfzdry as 4sfzdry, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from engpeople_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 5id,a.lryy as 5lryy,a.bzlx as 5bzlx,a.zjhm as 5zjhm,a.djrq as 5djrq, a.zjdqrq as 5zjdqrq,a.zslx as 5zslx,a.sfzdgzry as 5sfzdgzry,a.tslxfs as 5tslxfs,a.jtzycylxfs as 5jtzycylxfs, a.yhzgx as 5yhzgx,a.hzsfz as 5hzsfz, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from flow_people_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 6id,a.xyqk as 6xyqk,a.zybm as 6zybm,a.zymc as 6zymc,a.zytc as 6zytc, a.cylb as 6cylb,a.jdxx as 6jdxx,a.zyzgzs as 6zyzgzs,a.hscjdcsjjsxl as 6hscjdcsjjsxl,a.sg as 6sg, a.tz as 6tz,a.zylysl as 6zylysl,a.yylysl as 6yylysl,a.jkzk as 6jkzk,a.stmc as 6stmc,a.bsdc as 6bsdc, a.wcqk as 6wcqk,a.zzcs as 6zzcs,a.bydjjl as 6bydjjl,a.yy as 6yy,a.djxs as 6djxs,a.sftj as 6sftj,a.bz as 6bz, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from militaryservice_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 7id,a.rdsq as 7rdsq,a.zzrq as 7zzrq,a.cjgzsj as 7cjgzsj,a.rdszzb as 7rdszzb, a.zzszzb as 7zzszzb,a.zzszdw as 7zzszdw,a.szdzb as 7szdzb,a.jrdzbsj as 7jrdzbsj,a.xrdnzw as 7xrdnzw, a.rdjsr as 7rdjsr,a.yyjndf as 7yyjndf, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from party_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 8id,a.sfqzxf as 8sfqzxf,a.lxcs as 8lxcs,a.ldcs as 8ldcs,a.sfsj as 8sfsj, a.sfrs as 8sfrs,a.sffsdd as 8sffsdd,a.sfrysq as 8sfrysq,a.clqkbf as 8clqkbf, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from sfpeople_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 9id,a.sqjzrybh as 9sqjzrybh,a.yjycs as 9yjycs,a.jzlb as 9jzlb,a.ajlb as 9ajlb, a.jtzm as 9jtzm,a.ypxq as 9ypxq,a.ypxkssj as 9ypxkssj,a.ypxjssj as 9ypxjssj, a.jzkssj as 9jzkssj,a.jzjssj as 9jzjssj,a.jsfs as 9jsfs,a.ssqk as 9ssqk, a.sflgf as 9sflgf,a.ssqku as 9ssqku,a.sfjljzxz as 9sfjljzxz,a.jzjclx as 9jzjclx, a.sfytg as 9sfytg,a.tgyy as 9tgyy,a.jcjdtgqk as 9jcjdtgqk,a.tgjzqk as 9tgjzqk, a.sfylg as 9sfylg,a.lgyy as 9lgyy,a.jcjdlgqk as 9jcjdlgqk,a.lgjzqk as 9lgjzqk, a.jcqk as 9jcqk,a.xfbgzx as 9xfbgzx,a.sfcxfz as 9sfcxfz,a.cxfzmc as 9cxfzmc, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from sqjzpeople_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 22id,a.ccfxsj as 22ccfxsj,a.gkqk as 22gkqk,a.gkrxm as 22gkrxm,a.gkrlxfs as 22gkrlxfs, a.jtzyrysfzh as 22bfqk,a.bfrxm as 22bfrxm,a.bfrlxfs as 22bfrlxfs,a.ywfzs as 22ywfzs, a.xdqk as 22xdqk,a.xdyy as 22xdyy,a.xdhg as 22xdhg, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from xd_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 33id,a.sflf as 33sflf,a.yzm as 33yzm,a.ypxq as 33ypxq,a.fxcs as 33fxcs, a.sfrq as 33sfrq,a.wxxpglx as 33wxxpglx,a.xjrq as 33xjrq,a.xjqk as 33xjqk, a.azrq as 33azrq,a.azqk as 33azqk,a.wazyy as 33wazyy, a.bjqk as 33bjqk,a.sfcxfz as 33sfcxfz,a.cxfzzm as 33cxfzzm, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from xmsfpeople_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 44id,a.rylx as 44rylx,a.jtqk as 44jtqk,a.jhrsfz as 44jhrsfz,a.jhrxm as 44jhrxm, a.yjhrgx as 44yjhrgx,a.jhrlxfs as 44jhrlxfs,a.jhrjzxxdz as 44jhrjzxxdz,a.sfwffz as 44sfwffz, a.wffzqk as 44wffzqk,a.bfrlxfs as 44bfrlxfs,a.bfsd as 44bfsd, a.bfqk as 44bfqk, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from zdqsn_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.id as 55id,a.jtjjzk as 55jtjjzk,a.sfnrdb as 55sfnrdb,a.jhrsfzh as 55jhrsfzh,a.jhrxm as 55jhrxm, a.jhrlxfs as 55jhrlxfs,a.ccfbrq as 55ccfbrq,a.mqzdlx as 55mqzdlx,a.ywzszhs as 55ywzszhs, a.zszhcs as 55zszhcs,a.sczszhrq as 55sczszhrq,a.mqwxxpgdj as 55mqwxxpgdj, a.zlqk as 55zlqk,a.zlyy as 55zlyy,a.sszyzlyy as 55sszyzlyy,a.jskfxljgmc as 55jskfxljgmc, a.cyglry as 55cyglry,a.bfqk as 55bfqk, b.*,ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), @b.birthday)/365.2422) AS age from zszh_info a left join person_baseinfo b on a.person_baseinfo_id=b.id where 1= 1 ${ew.sqlSegment}
